description: While walking through the city center, I stumbled upon this guy. I had to admire him a little because he looked quite relaxed considering that he was a soon-to-be father. When you have no money, such a situation can be very stressful. He was working hard to create a financial reserve, but it left him exhausted. That's why he went for a walk to clear his head. He was talkative; I think he needed someone to share his problems with. I offered him a few thousand Crowns for the talk, which made him quite happy. I wondered if he would be willing to have some gay fun, but apparently he needed money really badly. Taking off his T-shirt was easy for him so I decided to push harder. I was lucky that he was a committed provider; this sex was for a good cause.
title: Czech Hunter 394
